Articles.Content:
I have search for this problem but haven found anything on it. The rover wheels in 0.23 seems to have been extremely over buffed, the smallest wheels used to break so easily and now they are literally indestructible.

Take a look at their collision resistance in the VAB, the largest wheels have a breaking speed of 150m/s if I remember right.

Isn't this removing features from the game such as EVA repair

Here is a comparison with the last version of KSP: http://wiki.kerbalspaceprogram.com/wiki/Rover

the values in the wiki are not yet updated

The part.cfg files are unchanged between 0.22 and 0.23 for all of the rover wheels. You might just be seeing data which wasn't so visible in the editor parts info before. I've not played around with rovers in 0.23 so far, so no comment on the actual behaviour of them, just an observation on the part configuration parameters, which is where any change like that should be visible.
I haven't used them yet but 150m/s breaking speed seems reasonable. Having them experience SUD at reaching 30m/s was pretty absurd. Real wheels don't suddenly fly apart at those speeds.
